subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Fordham fired its men’s basketball coach, Dereck Whittenburg, on Thursday, with the team 1-4 amid a string of disappointing seasons and transfers of several key players.
snippet: Fordham fired its men’s basketball coach, Dereck Whittenburg, on Thursday, with the team 1-4 amid a string of disappointing seasons and transfers of several key players.
